mapper.insert: insert into zj_area (area_id, area_name, pid, level_num, letter1, letter2, choose_num, status, remakes, add_time, update_time, delete_flag, type_id, memo1, add_user_id, transaction_id, update_user_id, tel ) values (#{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{levelNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{letter1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{letter2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chooseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remakes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update zj_area set area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, level_num = #{levelNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, letter1 = #{letter1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, letter2 = #{letter2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choose_num = #{chooseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remakes = #{remakes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memo1 = #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select area_id, area_name, pid, level_num, letter1, letter2, choose_num, status, remakes, add_time, update_time, delete_flag, type_id, memo1, add_user_id, transaction_id, update_user_id, tel from zj_area where area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select area_id, area_name, pid, level_num, letter1, letter2, choose_num, status, remakes, add_time, update_time, delete_flag, type_id, memo1, add_user_id, transaction_id, update_user_id, tel from zj_area
